body_html:
You could "ln -s" your libcudart.so.7.5 to libcudart.so.7.0

On Tue, Aug 2, 2016 at 7:17 PM, Deepak notifications@github.com wrote:

I only have libcudart.so.7.5 at
/usr/local/cuda-7.5/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/libcudart.so.7.5
. I do not have libcudart.so.7.0.
Also I did not install tensorflow from source.

—
You are receiving this because you commented.
Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
#3616 (comment),
or mute the thread
https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AABaHBXLX85Qr2S-CCjDrjMwGv9fIdTxks5qb_pVgaJpZM4JbOvB
.

body:
You could "ln -s" your libcudart.so.7.5 to libcudart.so.7.0

On Tue, Aug 2, 2016 at 7:17 PM, Deepak notifications@github.com wrote:

> I only have libcudart.so.7.5 at
> /usr/local/cuda-7.5/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/libcudart.so.7.5
> . I do not have libcudart.so.7.0.
> Also I did not install tensorflow from source.
